alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:12PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CARROLL AND NORTHERN TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 311 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Strasburg, or 8 miles northwest of Dover, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Dover, Strasburg, Bolivar, Mineral City, Dellroy, Parral, Zoar, and Atwood Lake. This includes Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 86 and 94. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east central Ohio.
